answers.author: Pamela Muse
answers.text:
Shannon – when I worked for the city of Concord, CA we did a weekly “blue-sheet” (if you had an item) alerting the CM of any new items/information.  Not sure if they’re still doing blue-sheets or not.  Might call the CM, Valerie Barone at 925-61-3000.  
I hope the info below is helpful:
Town of Morrisville – Briefing Sheet
http://www2.townofmorrisville.org/webAgendas/2013/20130108/2013-012.pdf 
Johnson County – Briefing Sheet
http://lims.jocogov.org/sirepub/cache/155/k5o5vdiiiijrn145g52jmo45/46078705202013102808644.PDF
Pam
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
888-468-6450 Office
480-231-3538 Text
pmuse@transformgov.org
www.transformgov.org

answers.author: Leslie Beauregard
answers.text:
Are you wanting to brief Council or the City Manager?  Was not sure but wanted to share this link to our Council Agendas which you might find helpful, or not.  http://www.charlottesville.org/Index.aspx?page=141

author: Shannon Flanagan-Watson
text:
Do you have a briefing template or a sample of an issue paper that you use for staff to brief you on issues? If so, could you please share a copy? 
Thank you in advance!
Shannon Flanagan-Watson
Assistant County Manager
Arlington, VA
title: Briefing Template for City or County Managers
